      static void ifThen(BoolVar BVAR, Constraint CSTR)
      Imply a constraint: BVAR => CSTR Also called half reification constraint Ensures:

      - BVAR = 1 => CSTR is satisfied,

      - CSTR is not satisfied => BVAR = 0

      Example :
      - ifThen(b1, arithm(v1, "=", 2));: b1 is equal to 1 => v1 = 2, so v1 !

      • ifThenElse

        public static void ifThenElse(Constraint IF,
                              Constraint THEN,
                              Constraint ELSE)
        Post a constraint ensuring that if IF is satisfied, then THEN is satisfied as well Otherwise, ELSE must be satisfied BEWARE : it is automatically posted (it cannot be reified)
        Parameters:
        IF - a constraint
        THEN - a constraint
        ELSE - a constraint

      • ifThenElse

        public static void ifThenElse(BoolVar BVAR,
                              Constraint THEN,
                              Constraint ELSE)
        Implication constraint: BVAR => THEN && not(B) => ELSE.
        Ensures:

        - BVAR = 1 => THEN is satisfied,

        - BVAR = 0 => ELSE is satisfied,

        - THEN is not satisfied => BVAR = 0

        - ELSE is not satisfied => BVAR = 1

        In order to have BVAR <=> THEN, use reification BEWARE : it is automatically posted (it cannot be reified)

        Parameters:
        BVAR - variable of reification
        THEN - the constraint to be satisfied when BVAR = 1
        ELSE - the constraint to be satisfied when BVAR = 0

      • ifThen

        public static void ifThen(Constraint IF,
                          Constraint THEN)
        Post a constraint ensuring that if IF is satisfied, then THEN is satisfied as well BEWARE : it is automatically posted (it cannot be reified)
        Parameters:
        IF - a constraint
        THEN - a constraint

      • ifThen

        public static void ifThen(BoolVar BVAR,
                          Constraint CSTR)
        Imply a constraint: BVAR => CSTR Also called half reification constraint Ensures:

        - BVAR = 1 => CSTR is satisfied,

        - CSTR is not satisfied => BVAR = 0

        Example :
        - ifThen(b1, arithm(v1, "=", 2));: b1 is equal to 1 => v1 = 2, so v1 != 2 => b1 is equal to 0 But if b1 is equal to 0, nothing happens BEWARE : it is automatically posted (it cannot be reified) Note that its implementation relies on reification (it will not be faster)

        Parameters:
        BVAR - variable of reification
        CSTR - the constraint to be satisfied when BVAR = 1

      • reification

        public static void reification(BoolVar BVAR,
                               Constraint CSTR)
        Reify a constraint with a boolean variable: BVAR <=> CSTR Ensures:

        - BVAR = 1 <=> CSTR is satisfied,
        BEWARE : it is automatically posted (it cannot be reified)

        Parameters:
        BVAR - variable of reification
        CSTR - the constraint to be satisfied when BVAR = 1
